name: PolyFun
description:
Features:
- Unlimited levels.
- 6 types of enemies.
- 1 superpower.
- Fast pace.
- Lots of fun!

Controls:
- Tilt to move the spaceship.
- Press and hold to shoot.
- Double tap to activate superpower.
- Tap with two fingers to adjust tilt angle.

Objective:
- Shoot polygons and see how far you can go!

Have fun!
